project_metadata.description: A customer feedback management platform where businesses can collect, organize, and respond to customer feedback. Helps companies improve their products based on real user input.
project_metadata.target_user: Small to medium businesses who want to collect and manage customer feedback efficiently
core_features: User authentication with email and password
Submit feedback with rating (1-5 stars), category, and detailed comments
View all feedback submissions in a dashboard
Filter feedback by rating and category
Admin can respond to customer feedback
project_metadata.monetization_model: Free tier with basic features, Premium for advanced analytics

special_considerations.performance_requirements: Response time under 500ms for feedback submission
special_considerations.compliance_needs: GDPR compliant for user data storage
special_considerations.scalability_expectations: Support up to 10,000 feedback submissions in first year
special_considerations.custom_requirements: Ability to export feedback data as CSV
